|vo_09_01_rm         = Watashi wa betsu ni sainou ga aru wake de mo nai shi, rikairyoku datte tarinai... Issho-kenmei benkyou shite shiken ni goukaku shita kara Kyoureiin ni haireta dake na no. Gomen ne, watashi... A, zatsudan wa koko made ni shite okou. Kyoureiin to ieba, watashi no kadai no shinchoku houkoku... Mada sukoshi mo susundenai tte omoidashichatta.

|vo_09_03_tx         = スメールにいる才能溢れる人はほとんど、教令院までやってきてる。それに、ここはびっくりするほど賢い外国の学者さんもいて、どれだけ競争が激しいか…考えても見て！そんな人たちと一緒に勉強するなんて…私、本当にその資格を持ってるのかな…？

Watashi, hontou ni sono shikaku wo motteru no ka na...?

|vo_09_04_tx         = しー、静かに。この子を起こさないでよ。このままゆっくり寝かせてあげましょう。あたしの言うこの子が誰かって？そりゃあもちろん、毎日課題に追われるレイラよ。で、あたし？ふふ、あたしもレイラ。

|vo_13_01_title      = 突破した感想・起
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = レイラ、ほら。もう一息頑張ろう。
|vo_13_01_rm         = Reira, hora. Mou hitoiki ganbarou.
|vo_13_01_tl         = Layla, come on. Let's try a little bit harder.

|vo_13_02_title      = 突破した感想・承
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = レイラ、すごく頑張ってたけど、まだ全面的な知識を得たわけじゃないよ。
|vo_13_02_rm         = Reira, sugoku ganbatteta kedo, mada zenmenteki-na chishiki wo eta wake ja nai yo.
|vo_13_02_tl         = Layla, you've worked hard, but you still don’t know everything.

|vo_13_03_title      = 突破した感想・転
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = レイラ、あなたは勤勉で博識&mdash;&mdash;それで良い。でも、怠けちゃだめ。一瞬でも怠けると、遅れをとって留年って言う悲惨な結末を迎えることになるんだから。
|vo_13_03_rm         = Reira, anata wa kinben de hakushiki{{lmdash}} Sore de ii. De mo, namakecha dame. Isshun de mo namakeru to, okure wo totte ryuunen tte iu hisan-na ketsumatsu wo mukaeru koto ni naru nda kara.
|vo_13_03_tl         = Layla, you've worked diligently and learned many things &mdash; and that's good. But you can't slack off. Because if you slack off even for a moment, you'll fall behind and end up repeating the year, which would be a disastrous outcome.

|vo_13_04_title      = 突破した感想・結
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = レイラ、自分を信じよう。沢山助けてくれた人を信じよう。あなたたちなら、きっと何でも解決できるわ！<br />ふぅ…さて、悩みも忘れたことだし、出発しましょう！
|vo_13_04_rm         = Reira, jibun wo shinjiyou. Takusan tasukete kureta hito wo shinjiyou. Anata-tachi nara, kitto nandemo kaiketsu dekiru wa!<br />Fuu... Sate, nayami mo wasureta koto da shi, shuppatsu shimashou!
|vo_13_04_tl         = Layla, believe in yourself. Believe in the ones who helped you so much along the way. Anything is possible when you work together!<br />Phew... Alright. Now that you're free of worries, let's head out!
}}
